title: I am a physics, chemistry, biology, and maths student. Can I opt for information technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, definitely. But we don’t know why you are opting for IT. If you love computers, have a passion for writing programs and exploring new electronic gadgets, then you head for it straight. Otherwise please do not fall for it just by watching people in IT making money and visiting G8 countries. Because it will surely degrade your performance in an area where your heart is not there.
